      private NodeFibHeap FibonacciHeap.meld(NodeFibHeap node1, NodeFibHeap node2)
      Melds two trees Removes the to be child tree from top-level circular list and adds it to the to be parent's child circular list, updating the sibling and parent pointers.
      NodeFibHeap HashTagCounter.remove()
      Temporary remove of top 'N' hashtags for outputting trending hashtags
      NodeFibHeap FibonacciHeap.remove()
      Removes maximum node from the Fibonacci heap Updates new maximum and consolidates top circular list trees until no trees of equal rank are left Uses meld operation internally

      private boolean FibonacciHeap.addLowerLevelNodeToTopLevellist(NodeFibHeap temp)
      Since nodes from lower level will be removed during both increase key and cascading cuts modularized to separate function
      void FibonacciHeap.arbitaryRemove(NodeFibHeap node) 
      void FibonacciHeap.cascadingCut(NodeFibHeap temp)
      It checks whether the increased node in increaseKey is larger than its parent node, if so it will remove the increased node from its parent and add to top level circular list.

      Increases the key of a node and updates it in Fibonacci Heap and max if necessary
